name: ai-inventory-management
description: AI-powered stock management with conversational interface and invoice processing

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../ai-services && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.prisma:migrate: cd backend && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.prisma:seed: cd backend && npx prisma db seed
